alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Franklin (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 5:28PM EDT until July 09 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Clinton County in northern New York... East central Franklin County in northern New York... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 527 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Standish, moving northeast at 5 mph. Law enforcement reports trees down between Merrill and Lyon Mountain. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Merrill, Bryants Mill, Jericho, Lyon Mountain, Dannemora, Ellenburg Mountain, Chazy Lake, Harrigan, Ellenburg Center, Standish, and Wolf Pond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
